title: Early assessment of blood culture negativity as a potential support tool for antimicrobial stewardship
content:
Publication date: 30 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Giulia Menchinelli, Alice Oliveti, Barbara Fiori, Tiziana D'Inzeo, Teresa Spanu, Rita Murri, Massimo Fantoni, Maurizio Sanguinetti, Brunella Posteraro, Giulia De Angelis
